Title: The Djinn (No. 43)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Daniel Cerone, Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red enlists a task force to locate the Djinn, an enigmatic woman who fulfills revenge fantasies. Red and Liz believe the Djinn can lead them to the Cabal and help them exonerate Liz.
